name: Impossible Off Road Truck 2018
description:
With this Off road Euro Truck simulation you’ll become a great truck driver, take luggage from different place and transport them to another place by using off roads. It’s an easy task to transport luggage in hilly and impossible off roads. There is also a time laps you need transport luggage on time to complete the mission.
Become a truck driver in this expansive open world truck driver simulator.
Start from the bottom and work your company to the top. You start with a classic venerable truck.
Deliver trailers and earn money, upgrade your truck or buy more modern trucks.
If you are not into semi trucks, there is also a variety of Light Trucks. The choice is yours.
Features:
• 7 European truck brands (4x2 and 6x4 Axles)
• Drive across off road
• Easy controls (tilt, buttons or touch steering wheel)
• Realistic weather conditions and day/night cycle
• Visual damage on trucks
• Detailed interiors for each truck brand
• Amazing engine sounds
